title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: April 03, 2023, 02:16:34 PMLast edit: April 11, 2023, 05:26:48 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC 287Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-287-pereira-vs-adesanya-2/matchesMatches(2 points each)13. Alex Pereira vs. Israel Adesanya 12. Gilbert Burns vs. Jorge Masvidal11. Rob Font vs. Adrian Yanez10. Kevin Holland vs. Santiago Ponzinibbio9. Raul Rosas Jr. vs. Christian Rodriguez(1 point each)8. Kelvin Gastelum vs. Chris Curtis7. Michelle Waterson-Gomez vs. Luana Pinheiro6. Gerald Meerschaert vs. Joe Pyfer5. Cynthia Calvillo vs. Lupita Godinez4. Steve Garcia vs. Shayilan Nuerdanbieke3. Jaqueline Amorim vs. Sam Hughes2. Karl Williams vs. Chase Sherman1. Ignacio Bahamondes vs. Trey OgdenHow many matches will NOT go the Full Distance  Make sure your Prediction is in this format  Example13. Alex Pereira 12. Gilbert Burns 11. Rob Font 10. Kevin Holland9. Raul Rosas Jr. 8. Kelvin Gastelum 7. Michelle Waterson-Gomez 6. Gerald Meerschaert 5. Cynthia Calvillo 4. Steve Garcia 3. Jaqueline Amorim 2. Karl Williams 1. Ignacio Bahamondes NOT go the Full Distance 8(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
